snippet: The International Swaps and Derivatives Association says Argentina’s failure to make a payment on its bonds earlier this week will activate credit default swaps on the country’s debt.
abstract: The International Swaps and Derivatives Association says Argentina’s failure to make a payment on its bonds earlier this week will activate credit default swaps on the country’s debt.

headline.main: Argentina Default Is Ruled a Credit Event for Swaps
headline.print_headline: Argentina Ordered to Resume Talks With Hedge Fund
